++ Standardization

Standardization is when a [Capability]'s implementation or InvisibleImplementation is regarded official. Standardization prevents the need for [Reimplementation] which is HighStandards due to NoReimplementation.
    * The best example of standardization is CommonImplementations.


++Implementation

Standardization occurs in the following ways:
    * DownlevelToTheSystem
    * elected applications/frameworks
These all result in [SharedImplementation]s.
